name: 數位教學設計
description: There are two major goals of this course: a) to foster an comprehensive understanding of the knowledge domain of instructional design for e-Learning, and b) to acquire expertise in designing and conducting instructional design for e-Learning courseware.
goals: foster an understanding of the fundamental principles of learning and memory.
syllabus:
1.         Introduction to Instructional Systems Design

2.         Conducting the Needs Assessment

3.         Defining the Instructional Goal

4.         The Learner and the Environment

5.         Learning Outcomes & The Events of Instruction

6.         Information Processing Analysis

7.         Prerequisite Skills Analysis

8.         Writing Instructional Objectives

9.         Creating Assessment Approaches

10.      Instructional Strategies

11.      Delivery and Management

12.      Production

13.      Formative & Summative Evaluation

14.      The Future of ISD
